      CompactionConfig CompactionConfig.setCompactionStrategy​(CompactionStrategyConfig csConfig)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      since 2.1.0 use setSelector(CompactionSelectorConfig) and setConfigurer(CompactionConfigurerConfig) instead.
      CompactionConfig CompactionConfig.setConfigurer​(CompactionConfigurerConfig configurerConfig)
      Set and override any per-table properties that configure compaction file output like compression.
